There is a person with a goose hat in lobby 10. Talk to them and you will get a goose hat.

While wearing the goose hat there are some TODO list items. Complete those items for this field goal.
Each HONK replaces a letter and those replaced letters give you the final TODO instruction.
There is a car next to the Charles River.
There are trash cans in the Infinite Corridor and lobby 7.
There are spinning donuts in building 14.
There is a piano in a classroom in building 4.
